[Home](doc/markdown/./index.md) &gt; [@zephyr3d/device](doc/markdown/./device.md) &gt; [AbstractDevice](doc/markdown/./device.abstractdevice.md) &gt; [clearFrameBuffer](doc/markdown/./device.abstractdevice.clearframebuffer.md)

## AbstractDevice.clearFrameBuffer() method

Clears the current frame buffer

**Signature:**

```typescript
clearFrameBuffer(clearColor: Vector4, clearDepth: number, clearStencil: number): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  clearColor | [Vector4](doc/markdown/./base.vector4.md) | If not null, the color buffer will be cleared to this value. |
|  clearDepth | number | If not null, the depth buffer will be cleared to this value. |
|  clearStencil | number | If not null, the stencil buffer will be cleared to this value. |

**Returns:**

any
